sentences.sContent: I never thought of myself as a bastard, an egoist .
sentences.sContent_eng: I never thought of myself as a bastard, an egoist .
sentences.sCn: 我从没想过我自己是个杂种， 利己主义者。

sentences.sContent: And so a hyper-inflated egoist from hyper-INFERIORITY Complex issue book after book to show cause of its LKYism wiseDOOM!
sentences.sContent_eng: And so a hyper-inflated egoist from hyper-INFERIORITY Complex issue book after book to show cause of its LKYism wiseDOOM!
sentences.sCn: 一堆极度自卑的复杂问题产生了这么一个极度膨胀的利己主义者，显示出了其李光耀主义的智慧。

synos.tran: 自我主义者；利己主义者

words.tran: 自私自利的，自我中心的
自私自利的；自我中心的；利已主义的
